organization.fullName: Shanghai Ming Ju Biotechnology Co., Ltd.

identificationModule.briefTitle: CD19-targeted CAR T Cells for Relapsed or Refractory (R/R) Large B-cell Lymphoma
identificationModule.officialTitle: An Open-Label, Single-Arm Study of Relma-cel, CD19-targeted Chimeric Antigen Receptor (CAR)T Cells for Relapsed or Refractory (R/R) LBCL

leadSponsor.name: Shanghai Ming Ju Biotechnology Co., Ltd.

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This is an open-label, single-arm study to treat the adult R/R Large B-cell Lymphoma subjects with Relmacabtagene autoleucel (relma-cel) in China.
descriptionModule.detailedDescription:
This is an open-label, single-arm study conducted in adult subjects with R/R LBCL in China to evaluate efficacy，safety and pharmacokinetics(PK) of relma-cel.

Relma-cel was approved by the China National Medical Products Administration(NMPA)in September 2021(Acceptance No:CXSS2000036)for the treatment of adult patients with R/R LBCL after second-line or more systemic therapy.The recommended dose is 1×10\^8 CAR+T cells.The indication for this application is R/R LBCL and the recommended dose is 1×10\^8 CAR+T cells.

armGroups.label: Relma-cel
armGroups.description: Efficacy, safety and PK of Relma-cel will be evaluated in 1 x 10\^8 CAR+T cells dose level

interventions.name: Relma-cel
interventions.description: Relma-cel will be administered at one dose level:1×10\^8 CAR+T cells
otherNames: CD19-targeted Chimeric Antigen Receptor(CAR) T Cells

primaryOutcomes.measure: Objective response rate (ORR) in LBCL subjects
primaryOutcomes.description: Objective response rate (ORR) in 3 month evaluated by investigator of LBCL subjects

secondaryOutcomes.description: Objective response rate (ORR) in 3 month evaluated by IRC of LBCL subjects

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Best objective response rate ( Best ORR) in LBCL subjects
secondaryOutcomes.description: Best objective response rate (ORR) evaluated by the investigator and IRC of LBCL subjects
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: up to 1 year after Relma-cel infusion

secondaryOutcomes.measure: Complete response rate (CRR) in LBCL subjects
secondaryOutcomes.description: Complete response rate (CRR) at any time points evaluated by the investigator
secondaryOutcomes.timeFrame: up to 1 year after Relma-cel infusion
